trivia_items.text: Her codename means "drifting snow" in Russian.
Her real name likely has its inspirations from various notable Russians in history:
sub_items: Her first name, Avdotya, likely derives from Avdotya Panaeva, a Russian novelist in the 19th century known for her works that advocate emancipation of women, fitting Pozëmka's career as a novelist.
Her middle name, Nikolaevna, likely derives from Olga Nikolaevna, the eldest daughter of the last Russian tsar Nicolas II, referencing her noble origin and the bloody royal feud she experienced.

trivia_items.text: All of Pozëmka's skill names has literature or writing references.
Pozëmka is one of several Arknights characters whose name is pronounced and written differently in all servers.
Pozëmka is the first Operator whose codename uses diacritics and the third Arknights character with this distinction after Lin Yühsia and Młynar.
Pozëmka has been jokingly compared with Chisato Nishikigi from Lycoris Recoil in the CN community.
sub_items: Both shares the same Japanese voice actress (Chika Anzai).
Both are literal "snipers" (with the latter using a pistol).
Both share similar red color scheme.
The former could ignore physical Dodge through her Operator Module, contrasting Chisato's dodging skills.

trivia_items.text: Pozëmka's English dialogues are spoken in a Russian accent, fitting to her Ursine origin.
